summary: Makes almost every unplayable humanoid race playable.
descriptionHtml:
Have you ever felt that Skyrim was lacking something? While you were making you're character, did you think to yourself, "Man I wish I could be a Dremora, or a kid, or a Mannequin, or a lady with 3rd degree burns, or a floating head...." Well my friend, this mod is definitely for you. What does U.H.R.M.P do, you may ask? In case you haven't already figured it out, This mod makes the Dremora, Burnt Astrid Race, Mannequins, and Children playable. There are currently four kinds of children for you to choose from. Nord Children, Redguard Children, Imperial Children, and Breton Children. All races support both genders, and I didn't come across any problems whilst playing as them, except for the fact that most of these races can't wear armor, and the rare crash or two while playing as the mannequins, but it's really nothing that will destroy the experience for you, I hope. 

Installation: Download it, and... you know what to do next.

Tired of running around as a kid, but naked? Check out my mod here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/48363//?

If you experience any bugs, glitches, etc, please let me know. Also, if you have any questions, PM me, and I'll get back to you as soon as I can.

The Description for the Dremora can be found here: http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Dremora_(Skyrim)
author: Ronin
